hero.title: Moonfest 2026
hero.tagline: Colombia’s biggest furry convention. Community, art, and a full experience.

about.title: Why Moonfest?
about.paragraph1: Moonfest is Colombia’s biggest and most anticipated furry convention. A complete experience with activities, art, and spaces built for the community.
about.paragraph2: After the 2025 comeback, 2026 brings more energy, better production, and a community ready to meet again.

travel.title: Travel tips
travel.subtitle: Weather, rain, and local plans to make the most of Paipa.

weather.title: July weather: cool + humid
weather.description: Average highs around 14.8°C and lows near 7.5°C, with about 29.6 rainy days and humidity near 91%. Pack thermal layers.

rain.title: Frequent rain
rain.description: July is rainy: bring a rain jacket, a cover for electronics, and non‑slip shoes.

thermals.title: Paipa thermal parks (external)
thermals.description: There are several thermal complexes (ITP Water Park, El Delfín, Pozo Azul, La Playa). The ITP park is ~4 km from town via Pantano de Vargas; check its website for rates.

lago.title: Lake Sochagota
lago.description: Located in the hotel zone and created to boost tourism; it’s a key spot for water sports and photos.

pantano.title: Pantano de Vargas
pantano.description: Historic site with the Lancers Monument, about 10 km from the urban center.

salitre.title: Hacienda El Salitre
salitre.description: A 17th‑century colonial estate with thermal pools; it served as headquarters after the Battle of Pantano de Vargas and now operates as a hotel.

food.title: Local food
food.description: Paipa’s almojábana and masato are classic local staples; you’ll also find cheeses and baked goods.

events.title: Cultural events
events.description: Paipa hosts the National Bands Contest, one of its most recognized cultural events.

venue.title: Official venue
venue.name: ESTELAR Paipa Hotel & Convention Center
venue.description: Lakefront calm, forest trails, thermal jacuzzis, sauna, and a wellness spa make recovery between events effortless. The convention center is built for big gatherings, while three dining options (local, international, and Italian) plus a wine bar keep the nights social.
venue.description2: July in Paipa is cool (avg high 14.8°C, low 7.5°C), a comfortable range for fursuits and layered looks that photograph beautifully. The scenery and spaces invite artistic expression, from shoots by the lake to relaxed lounges for sketching and collaboration.
venue.description3: On‑site services keep your schedule full without leaving the property: business center, reliable Wi‑Fi, free parking, pet‑friendly policies, and outdoor options like farm visits, horseback riding, and bike rides.
venue.feature2: Thermal jacuzzis, sauna, wellness spa, and pool
venue.feature3: Lakefront setting, forest trails, and photo-ready views
venue.feature4: 3 dining options: local, international, Italian + wine bar
venue.feature7: Business center, free Wi‑Fi, and free parking
venue.feature8: Farm visits, horseback riding, and bike rides
venue.certification: Safe Guard + Check in Certificado (MinCIT/Bureau Veritas)

registration.title: Reservations
registration.subtitle: Official event package: 4 days and 3 nights. Includes entry, Bogotá‑convention bus, and room. Hotel extras are paid separately.

package.feature2: Round-trip bus transport: Bogotá -> hotel -> Bogotá
package.feature4: Find your group for the best price
package.feature4SoloDuo: Enjoy full privacy for you and/or one companion

registration.devNote: Shared rooms are priced per person. The room for 1 or 2 people has a fixed total price.
registration.noteServices: Additional hotel services (spa, thermal pools, bar, etc.) are not included in the package.
registration.highlight: Want to attend? Reserve today and secure your place at this unforgettable event.

registrationTutorial.title: How registration works: complete both payments
registrationTutorial.subtitle: Moonfest access requires a two-step process. First reserve your room for the event dates, then pay the event ticket using your reservation code.
registrationTutorial.warning: You must complete two separate payments: hotel reservation and event ticket. Completing only one is not enough.

step1.title: Reserve your hotel room
step1.description: Start with the official Estelar booking flow for July 10-13, 2026.
step1.point1: Complete the room payment directly with the hotel.
step1.point2: Save the reservation confirmation and your code.

step2.title: Buy your Moonfest ticket
step2.description: After hotel payment, continue with the event ticket process.
step2.point1: Use your reservation code in the ticket checkout.
step2.point2: Pay your event ticket in the official Moonfest flow.

step3.title: Keep both confirmations
step3.description: Your access depends on both completed records.
step3.point1: Have both payment proofs available before the event.
step3.point2: If anything is missing, contact info@moonfest.com.co.

checklist.title: Quick checklist
checklist.item1: Hotel room reserved for the event dates
checklist.item3: Event ticket paid with that code

actions.note: Ticket checkout remains separate from the hotel reservation.

q1.question: Can I book just one night?

q2.question: What does the package include?
q2.answer: Includes event entry, bus transport from Bogotá, room, and breakfast.

q3.question: How can I book?
q3.answer: You must reserve directly with the hotel using the official booking link.

q4.question: What happens if I don’t pay on time?

q5.question: Can I attend without staying at the hotel?
q5.answer: No, Moonfest is exclusive to hotel guests.

q6.question: Can I buy my ticket without booking?
q6.answer: Yes, but you won’t be able to attend without lodging. The ticket grants access to activities, but the reservation is required.

q7.question: What if I want to change my reservation?
q7.answer: Contact the hotel directly for any changes.
